text:
♪ A BIG BEAUTIFUL BRAIN
WITH A PRETTY FACE, YEAH ♪

♪ A BABYDOLL WITH
A BRIEFCASE, YEAH ♪

♪ A HOT LITTLE
HURRICANE, HA ♪

HELLO AND WELCOME TO THE MUSIC
VIDEO FOR 'HEY HEY HEY'

I AM DRESSED AS MARIE ANTOINETTE
OR SOMETHING LIKE IT, HEY GIRL

WE'RE HERE IN BEVERLY HILLS,
LUXURIOUS, THIS VIDEO IS REALLY
FUN BECAUSE

I GET TO BE TWO
DIFFERENT CHARACTERS

ONE, I GET TO BE MARIE
ANTOINETTE

AND THEN I GET TO BE
JOAN OF ARC

AND ITS BASICALLY MARIE
ANTOINETTE DREAMING
ABOUT BEING JOAN OF ARC

AND DOESN'T WANT TO
BE THIS UPTIGHT LADY

YOU DON'T HAVE TO BE JUST ONE
THING IF YOU'RE A WOMAN

YOU CAN BE ALL THINGS AND JUST
BECAUSE YOU'RE VULNERABLE DOES
NOT MAKE YOU WEAK

THAT IS KINDA WHAT WE'RE TRYING
TO TELL IN THIS MUSIC VIDEO
FOR 'HEY HEY HEY'

♪ YOU THINK THAT
I'M A LITTLE BABY ♪

♪ YOU THINK THAT I AM
FRAGILE LIKE A FABERGÉ ♪

♪ YOU THINK THAT I AM CRACKING,
BUT YOU CAN'T BREAK ME ♪

SO WE JUST SHOT THE ETIQUETTE
SCENE WHERE BASICALLY

ALL OF THE OTHER LADIES WERE
EATING FINGER SANDWICHES

WITH THEIR TEETH THEY
WERE NIBBLING THEM

THEY DID NOT HAVE ANY CRUSTS BUT
I SAW SOME CHIPS THAT I REALLY
LIKED NAMED TAKIS

THEY WERE LIKE THOSE
SPICY HOT FUEGO ONES

AND I JUST ATE THEM LIKE AN
ANIMAL

ITS KINDA BASICALLY LIKE A
AUTOBIOGRAPHY

ALL MY FRIENDS ARE A LOT
MORE CLASSY THAN I AM
♪ NO WAY ♪
♪ NO, NO WAY ♪
♪ NO, NO WAY ♪

♪ YOU THINK THAT
I AM CRACKING, ♪

♪ BUT YOU CAN'T BREAK
ME (BREAK ME) ♪

I HAD NO IDEA I WAS EVEN
GOING TO BE SLAPPED FROM
THE GET GO

BUT THEY ASKED ME IF I'D BE OKAY
WITH IT I SAID 'YEAH'

I DIDN'T THINK IT'D BE
LIKE TWELVE FIFTEEN
SLAPS IN A ROW THERE
OH NO!

SHE DIDN'T HOLD BACK ANYTHING SO
SHE REALLY LET ME HAVE IT

THESE ROSEY CHEEKS TONIGHT
IT'S NOT FROM MAKEUP

IT'S FROM KATY SLAPPING
THE S**T OUTTA ME
TAD! DO IT MAN!
REVEAL YOURSELF

WHEN HE WAS TELLING ME TO LICK
THE PLATE AND DO SOME OBSCENE
GESTURES TOWARDS KATY PERRY

I WAS A LITTLE TAKEN ABACK
SHE SEEMED OKAY WITH IT

SHE WAS EVEN THROWING THE
OBSCENE GESTURES RIGHT BACK
AT ME IT WAS AWESOME
♪ AND SECRETLY YOU LOVE IT ♪
♪ HEY, HEY, HEY ♪

♪ YOU THINK THAT
I'M A LITTLE BABY ♪

♪ YOU THINK THAT I AM
FRAGILE LIKE A FABERGÉ ♪

♪ YOU THINK THAT I AM CRACKING,
BUT YOU CAN'T BREAK ME ♪
♪ NO ♪
♪ HEY, HEY, HEY ♪

♪ YOU THINK THAT
I'M A LITTLE BABY ♪

♪ YOU THINK THAT I AM
FRAGILE LIKE A FABERGÉ ♪

♪ YOU THINK THAT I AM CRACKING,
BUT YOU CAN'T BREAK ME ♪
♪ NO, NO WAY (NO) ♪

THIS WHOLE CONCEPT WAS
BASED ON THE IDEA THAT

MAYBE SOMEONE LIKE MARIE
ANTOINETTE OR LIKE ANOTHER

CHARACTER VERSION OF HER
DISCOVERED JOAN OF ARC

THROUGH A BOOK OR
SOMETHING LIKE THAT AND

SAW HER STRENGTH AND
SAW HER PERSEVERANCE

AND SAW HER INDIVIDUALITY
SHE WAS DIFFERENT

AND I JUST THOUGHT MAYBE
IT WOULD BE FUN TO HAVE THAT
KIND OF DUALITY

SO STICK AROUND TO FIND OUT
WHO TRIUMPHS IN THE END!
♪ HEY, HEY, HEY ♪

♪ YOU THINK THAT
I'M A LITTLE BABY ♪

WE HAVE SIX DANCERS
ON THIS VIDEO

OUR THREE HANDMAIDENS:
CASEY, MARIA AND AI ARE
ON TOUR WITH KATY

AND THEY ARE OUR THREE
STEPSISTERS OF SORTS
A LITTLE HOCUS POCUS TRIO

LIKE CINDERELLA STEPSISTERS
YA KNOW

WORKING WITH KATY WE WEAR CRAZY
THINGS WE DO CRAZY THINGS

BUT NO MATTER WHAT AI
ALWAYS LOOKS GOOD

OH MY GOD, ALWAYS! SHE
ALWAYS PULLS THE LOOK OFF!
I DON'T CARE WHAT THE LOOK IS

KATY REALLY HELPS THOUGH BECAUSE
SHE'S SO WILLING TO GO THERE

YEAH, AND SHE'S SO... SHE TOLD
ME TO HIT HER HARDER 'OH!'

HER GOING THERE AND NOT BEING
AFRAID DEFINITELY GETS YOU
OUT OF YOUR COMFORT ZONE

YOU WOULD GO THE EXTRA MILE
BECAUSE SHE WANTS IT TO BE EXTRA
AND OVER THE TOP
SO SHE LOVES IT BEING REAL
THAT'S GREAT, CUT! THATS A WRAP!
